messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] What has been said
messages.msgSnippet: ... But that s not the point, is it?  Ok, it means something.  But you have quite a number of perfectly intelligent, educated people who completely missed what
messages.messageBody:
10/25/02 18:27:

> Absolutely it is real - and will get the same injured howls of
> "That's not what I meant" that Myranda has been posting.
>
> If you Google "ethics double effect" you get this as the first
> result -

But that's not the point, is it? Ok, it means something. But you have
quite a number of perfectly intelligent, educated people who completely
missed what in the world you were talking about.

I'm glad you have a point, in the sense that I do wonder sometimes if people
who write that type of stuff *do* have a point. In the future, for the sake
of the rest of us, could you please make your point a little more clearly
and not obfuscate the subject? <g>

brenda
